item.title: tar (child): gzip: Cannot exec: No such file or directory
item.description: $ tar -zxvf openjdk-11.0.1_linux-x64_bin.tar.gz tar (child): gzip: Cannot exec: No such file or directory tar (child): Error is not recoverable: exiting now tar: Child returned status 2 tar: Error is not recoverable: exiting now 依存パッケージの gzip を入れてあげる
